00039     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];

00041 
00042 // utility function to check author name
00043 function checkAuthor($str_author_name)
00044 {
00045     global $dbs;
00046     $_q = $dbs->query('SELECT author_id FROM mst_author WHERE author_name=\''.$str_author_name.'\'');
00047     if ($_q->num_rows > 0) {
00048         $_d = $_q->fetch_row();
00049         // return the author ID
00050         return $_d[0];
00051     }
00052     return false;
00053 }
00054 
00055 // start the output buffer
00056 ob_start();
00057 /* main content */
00058 // biblio author save proccess
00059 if (isset($_POST['save']) AND (isset($_POST['authorID']) OR trim($_POST['search_str']))) {
00060     $author_name = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['search_str'])));
00061     // create new sql op object
00062     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00063     // check if biblioID POST var exists
00064     if (isset($_POST['biblioID']) AND !empty($_POST['biblioID'])) {
00065         $data['biblio_id'] = intval($_POST['biblioID']);
00066         // check if the author select list is empty or not
00067         if (isset($_POST['authorID']) AND !empty($_POST['authorID'])) {
00068             $data['author_id'] = $_POST['authorID'];
00069         } else if ($author_name AND empty($_POST['authorID'])) {
00070             // check author
00071             $author_id = checkAuthor($author_name);
00072             if ($author_id !== false) {
00073                 $data['author_id'] = $author_id;
00074             } else {
00075                 // adding new author
00076                 $author_data['author_name'] = $author_name;
00077                 $author_data['authority_type'] = $_POST['type'];
00078                 $author_data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00079                 $author_data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00080                 // insert new author to author master table
00081                 @$sql_op->insert('mst_author', $author_data);
00082                 $data['author_id'] = $sql_op->insert_id;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         $data['level'] = intval($_POST['level']);
00086 
00087         if ($sql_op->insert('biblio_author', $data)) {
00088             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00089             echo 'alert(\''.__('Author succesfully updated!').'\');';
00090             echo 'opener.setIframeContent(\'authorIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_author.php?biblioID='.$data['biblio_id'].'\');';
00091             echo '</script>';
00092         } else {
00093             utility::jsAlert(__('Author FAILED to Add. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error);
00094         }
00095     } else {
00096         if (isset($_POST['authorID']) AND !empty($_POST['authorID'])) {
00097             // add to current session
00098             $_SESSION['biblioAuthor'][$_POST['authorID']] = array($_POST['authorID'], intval($_POST['level']));
00099         } else if ($author_name AND empty($_POST['authorID'])) {
00100             // check author
00101             $author_id = checkAuthor($author_name);
00102             if ($author_id !== false) {
00103                 $last_id = $author_id;
00104             } else {
00105                 // adding new author
00106                 $data['author_name'] = $author_name;
00107                 $data['authority_type'] = $_POST['type'];
00108                 $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00109                 $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00110                 // insert new author to author master table
00111                 $sql_op->insert('mst_author', $data);
00112                 $last_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00113             }
00114             $_SESSION['biblioAuthor'][$last_id] = array($last_id, intval($_POST['level']));
00115         }
00116 
00117         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00118         echo 'alert(\''.__('Author added!').'\');';
00119         echo 'opener.setIframeContent(\'authorIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_author.php\');';
00120         echo '</script>';
00121     }
00122 }
